articles.description: George Ford kicks 27 points to steer England to a magnificent World Cup win over Argentina after Tom Curry's first-half red card.
articles.title: Ford steers 14-man England to epic win against Argentina

articles.description: Coco Gauff fulfils the potential she has long promised by landing her first Grand Slam title with a fightback win over Aryna Sabalenka in New York.
articles.title: Gauff wins US Open to land first major title

articles.description: England's conservative display proves soporific but does not take the shine off a remarkable show of Ukrainian unity in the Euro 2024 qualifier.
articles.title: 'Dreary England cannot spoil Ukraine's special night'

articles.description: Germany manager Hansi Flick is under further pressure after a 4-1 home loss to Japan in a friendly.
articles.title: Pressure mounts on Flick as Germany lose to Japan

articles.description: Scotland are huge underdogs against the brutal power of South Africa but have players that can hurt the World Cup holders, writes Tom English.
articles.title: 'Time for underdog to bark' - Scots out to shock Springboks

articles.description: Watch highlights as ODI debutants Mahika Gaur and Lauren Filer take three wickets each as England beat Sri Lanka by seven wickets in the first one-day international at Chester-le-Street.
articles.title: Highlights: England thrash Sri Lanka in first ODI

articles.description: England boss Gareth Southgate accepts his side did not "quite click" in attack as they were held to a 1-1 draw by Ukraine in their Euro 2024 qualifier.
articles.title: England attack did not quite click - Southgate

articles.description: Arsenal suffer a shock exit from the Women's Champions League qualifiers as they are beaten on penalties by French side Paris FC.
articles.title: Arsenal knocked out of Women's Champions League

articles.description: Andy Farrell says Ireland needed a half-time chat about their discipline as they thumped Romania 82-8 in their World Cup opener in Bordeaux.
articles.title: 'Our discipline had to improve' - Farrell on Romania win

articles.description: Rory McIlroy breaks a club and finds water then rocks on the 16th hole at The K Club but surges into contention in the Irish Open.
articles.title: McIlroy in Irish Open contention after day of drama
